title: Over 120,000 LP gas cylinders distributed so far, says Litro
body_lines: More than 120,000 cylinders of LP gas have been filled and distributed by this evening at Kerawalapitiya storage terminal and the process will continue for next few days to ease the gas shortage in the local market, the Litro Gas announced.
A spokesman for the Litro Gas also said that issues over opening of LCs, payment for LP gas, had now been sorted out.
